        static void psySleep(PsyInteger oDuration)
              throws PsyException
        Causes the currently executing context to sleep for the specified number of milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        oDuration - the duration to sleep for in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        PsyRangeCheckException - when the duration is negative.
